columns.name: SHIPMENT_GID
columns.description: The GID for the shipment.

columns.name: SHIPMENT_INF_COST_SEQNO
columns.description: The shipment informational cost sequence (key).

columns.name: DETAIL_SEQNO
columns.description: The detail sequence number (key).

columns.name: COST_TYPE
columns.description: The cost type for this shipment cost record.

columns.name: COST
columns.description: The cost value. Examples are base and accessorial.

columns.name: COST_CURRENCY_GID
columns.description: The cost currency GID.

columns.name: COST_BASE
columns.description: The cost in the base currency.

columns.name: ACCESSORIAL_CODE_GID
columns.description: The accessorial code identifier associated to the cost record if it was calculated from the rate accessorial.

columns.name: ACCESSORIAL_COST_GID
columns.description: The accessorial cost identifier associated to the cost record if it was calculated from the rate accessorial.

columns.name: RATE_GEO_COST_GROUP_GID
columns.description: The rate detail cost group identifier that was used in calculating this cost value.

columns.name: RATE_GEO_COST_SEQ
columns.description: The rate detail cost sequence that was used in calculating this cost value.

columns.name: SPECIAL_SERVICE_GID
columns.description: The special service identifier associated to the cost record if it was calculated from a special service.

columns.name: IS_COST_FIXED
columns.description: A Y/N indicator defining the cost element as permanent and not to recalculate it based on shipment modifications.

columns.name: PROCESS_AS_FLOW_THRU
columns.description: A Y/N indicator defining the cost element as a flow through cost when sent to the financial systems.

columns.name: ADJUSTMENT_REASON_GID
columns.description: An adjustment reason code GID  that categorizes the cost element as an adjustment and the type.

columns.name: GENERAL_LEDGER_GID
columns.description: The general ledger GID associated with the cost element and sent to financial systems.

columns.name: DOMAIN_NAME
columns.description: Database domain where this data is stored.

columns.name: INSERT_USER
columns.description: The user ID of the data insert user.

columns.name: INSERT_DATE
columns.description: Date and time of data insert.

columns.name: UPDATE_USER
columns.description: The user ID of the data update user.

columns.name: UPDATE_DATE
columns.description: Date and time of the most recent data update.
